mapper.insert: insert into tbl_qna_comment(qna_id, individual_member_id, qna_comment_parent, qna_comment_content) values(#{qnaId}, #{individualMemberId}, #{qnaCommentParent}, #{qnaCommentContent})
mapper.select: select c.id, c.qna_id, c.individual_member_id, m.member_name, c.qna_comment_parent, c.qna_comment_content, c.created_datetime as createdDatetime, c.updated_datetime as updatedDatetime from tbl_qna_comment c left join tbl_member m on c.individual_member_id = m.id where c.qna_id = #{qnaId} order by c.created_datetime asc
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_qna_comment where id = #{id} and individual_member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) > 0 from tbl_qna_comment where qna_id = #{qnaId} and individual_member_id = #{memberId} and qna_comment_parent is null
